explains: n. 异常事物，反常现象；近点角，近点距离
wordGroup: geochemical anomaly 地球化学异常，地化异常
height anomaly 高程异常，高程偏倚

sentences.en: The space shuttle had stopped transmitting data, a very serious anomaly for the mission.
sentences.cn: 这架航天飞机已经停止了传输数据，这是这次任务中一个十分严重的反常现象。

sentences.en: The January warmth turned out to be part of a remarkably persistent weather anomaly.
sentences.cn: 一月的温暖是显著地持续异常天气的一部分。

sentences.en: This iridium anomaly offers strong support for the Alvarez hypothesis even though no asteroid itself has ever been discovered.
sentences.cn: 这一铱异常为阿尔瓦雷斯假说提供了强有力的支持，尽管小行星本身从未被发现。
